title: N 172 Old Judge Brown's Champions Dave FOUTZ  St. Louis

posts.post_title: N 172 Old Judge Brown's Champions Dave FOUTZ  St. Louis
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bob C
1887 N172 Old Judge Brown's Champions Dave Foutz St. Louis variation. Photographic image is crisp, clear and bright with no yellowing or fading. Card is off center left to right - not trimmed. No creases on front. Reverse has "#500" in blue ink and "Scarce & Rare" written in pencil. Light surface crease is on back only. Not rebacked and card will grade.
Tough card and the front is beautiful. SOLD
